In order to enable the automatic version: In order to enable the automatic version checking you have to register your portal on chamilo.org. The information obtained by clicking this button is only for internal use and only aggregated data will be publicly available (total number of portals, total number of Chamilo course, total number of Chamilo users, ...) (see {0}). When registering you will also appear on the worldwide list ({1}). If you do not want to appear in this list you have to check the checkbox below. The registration is as easy as it can be: you only have to click this button:
To protect your site, make the whole {0}: Ukukhusela indawo yakho, yenza lonke i-directory {0} ingafundeki (chmod -R 0555 kwiLinux) kwaye susa i-directory {1}.
Cannot find your language in the list? C: Awulaziwa ulwimi lwakho kuluhlu? Qhagamshelana nathi kwi-info@chamilo.org ukuze unikelele njengomguqulelo.
Please read the following requirements t: Nceda ufunde ezi mfuno zilandelayo ngokupheleleyo.
Recommended settings for your server con: Iisetting ezicetywayo kulungelelwaniso lweseva yakho. Ezi setting zimiselwa kwifayile yolungelelwaniso ye php.ini kwiseva yakho.
Chamilo is free software distributed und: IChamilo yisoftware yasimahla esasazwa phantsi kwelayisensi yeGNU General Public (GPL).
The install script will create (or use): I-script yokufaka iya kudala (okanye isebenzise) i-database yeChamilo usebenzisa igama ledatabase elinikwe apha. Nceda uqiniseke ukuba umsebenzisi omnika unelungelo lokudala idatabase ngelgama elinikwe apha. Ukuba idatabase enegama elinye ikhona, iya kungabhalwa ngokutsha. Nceda ungasebenzisi umsebenzisi we-root njengomsebenzisi wedatabase yeChamilo. Oku kunokukhokelela kwiingxaki ezinkulu zokhuseleko.
The install script will erase all tables: Iskrip ye faki iya kucima zonke iitheyibhile kwedatha ekhethiweyo. Siyakucebisa ngokunzima ukuba wenze iguquka epheleleyo yazo phambi kokuba uqinisekise inyathelo lokugqibela lelo faki.
Nceda ulinde, oku kungathatha ixesha elide...
This icon will show for the link display: Esi khoni siza kubonakala kwilinki eboniswe njengesixhobo kwiphepha lasekhaya lesifundo.
The database connection has failed. This: Uqhagamshelwano lwedatha yephethini aluphumelele. Oku kudala kwenzeka ngenxa yomsebenzisi ongafanelekanga, igama eliphosakeleyo elingalunganga okanye isimboli sedatha esiphosakeleyo esibekwe ngasentla. Nceda uhlole ezi zicwangqiso kwaye uzame kwakhona.
The DSN fully includes all parameters ne: I-DSN iquka zonke iiparamitha ezifuneka ukuze uqhagamshelane nenkonzo yeposi. Ungafunda okungakumbi kwi {0}. Ixabiso eliqhelekileyo yi null://null kwaye iya kuyeka ukuthumela i-imeyile. Sebenzisa native://default ukusebenzisa ulawulo oluphantsi lwe-PHP kwiserver yakho. Nantsi ezimbalwa zeendlela ezixhasiweyo ze-DSN syntax: {1}.
The e-mail address from which e-mails wi: Idilesi ye-imeyile apho i-imeyile ziza kuthunyelwa kuyo xa i-platform ithumela i-imeyile, ikwasetyenziswa njenge-'reply-to' header. Sicebisa ukusebenzisa idilesi ye-'no-reply' apha, ukuthintetha ukuze ugwetywe kakhulu ibhokisi le-imeyile. Idilesi ye-imeyile yenkxaso echaziweyo kwicandelo lePlatform mayisetyenziswe ukunxibelelana nawe, kodwa ukuphendula izaziso ezizodwa akufuneka likhuthazwe.
The name that appears as the sender (nex: Igama elibonakala njengomthumeli (ecaleni kwedilesi yePosi Ukusuka) xa i-platform ithumela i-imeyile.
Some directories and the files they incl: Ezinye iidayrektori kunye neefayile eziziquka kufuneka zibhalwe yiseva yeweb ukuze iChamilo isebenze (iifayile ezifakwe ngumsebenzisi, iifayile ze homepage html, ...). Oku kunokuthetha utshintsho olwenziweyo kwiseva yakho (ngaphandle kwaloli jikelezo).
A database with the same name already ex: Isizuko sedatha esinagama elifanayo sele sikhona. Iya kucingwagcwelwa.
When you enter your portal for the first: Xa ungena kwiportal yakho okokuqala, eyona ndlela ibesana yokuyiqonda kukudala ikhosi ngekhonkco 'Create course' kwimenyu kwaye udlale kancinci.
You are about to start using one of the: Uza kuqala ukusebenzisa enye yeep랫폼 ezona zibalaseleyo ze-Open Source e-learning ezimakethe. Njengakweminye imisebenzi emininzi ye-Open Source, i-Chamilo ixhaswa ngoluntu olukhulu lwabafundi, ootitshala, abaphuhlisi, abadali bomxholo namashishini anqwenela ukukhuthaza iprojekthi ngcono.
By knowing a little bit more about you,: Ngokwazi into encinci ngakumbi ngawe, umlawuli weplatifomu, uhlobo lomsebenzisi obalulekileyo kuthi, oza kulawula le nkqubo yokufunda nge-e-learning, siza kukwazi ukwazisa abantu, ngokwezobalo, indlela esetyenziswa ngayo isoftware yethu ngelixa sihlonipha ubumfihlo bakho. Siya kukwazi na kukwazisa xa siququzelela imicimbi enokuba nefuthe kuwe okanye sinikezela ngeenkonzo ezongezelelweyo ezinokuba nexabiso kwintlangano yakho.
By filling this form, you agree that the: Ngokugcwalisa le fomu, uyavuma ukuba umhleli we-Chamilo, inkampani ye {0}, ebhalisiwe eBelgium, kunye/okanye amalungu enethiweki yayo yamaqabane (ababoneleli beenkonzo ze-Chamilo kuphela) banokukuthumela ulwazi nge-imeyile ngamaxesha athile malunga nemicimbi ebalulekileyo okanye uhlaziyo kwisoftware ye-Chamilo okanye uluntu. Oku kuya kunceda uluntu lukhule njengequmrhu elilungelelanisiweyo apho ulwazi luhamba khona, ngokuhlonipha okona kakhulu ixesha lakho nobumfihlo bakho.
Please note that you are NOT REQUIRED to: Qaphela ukuba awafuneki kugqitywa le fomu. Ukuba ufuna uhlala ungaziwayo, siza kuphulukana nethuba lokukunika onke amalungelo okuba ngumlawuli weplatifomu obhalisiweyo, kodwa sizakuqhelanisa isigqibo sakho. Nceda uyishiye le fomu ingenanto kwaye ucofa iNext.

The forum's auto-launch setting is on. S: Useto lokuqalisa ngokuzenzekelayo lweforum livuliwe. Abafundi baya kuphindiselwa kwisixhobo seforum xa bengena kule khosi.
The exercises auto-launch feature config: Uqulunqo lwenqobo yokuziqalisa ngokuzenzekelayo kwemisebenzi liyavulelwa. Abafundi baya kuthunyelwa ngokuzenzekelayo kumsebenzi okhethiweyo.
The learning path auto-launch setting is: Iseting yokuzenzekelayo yendlela yokufunda ivuliwe. Xa abafundi bengena kweli sifundo, baya kuphindiselwa ngokuzenzekelayo kwindlela yokufunda ephawulwe njengokuqaliswa okuzenzekelayo.
The document auto-launch feature configu: Uqwalaselo lwendalo yokumilisela ixwebhu livuliwe. Abafundi baya kuthunyelwa ngokuzenzekelayo kwisixhobo sexwebhu.
The exercises auto-launch feature config: Uqwalaselo lwendalo yokumilisela imisebenzi livuliwe. Abafundi baya kuthunyelwa ngokuzenzekelayo kuluhlu lwemisebenzi.

You must move or remove all learning pat: Kufuneka uhambe okanye ususe zonke iindlela zokufunda kule candelo phambi kokucima.
Export your course content in the IMS Co: Thumela umxholo wezifundo zakho kwi-IMS Common Cartridge 1.3 format, ukuze uwabelane ngayo kumaqonga amanye.
Import a course in IMS Common Cartridge: Genisa izifundo kwi-IMS Common Cartridge 1.3 format, eqhutywa namanye amaqonga ahambelana nelo fomathi. Inguqulelo ibalulekile.

What should be done with imported files: Kufuneka kwenteni iifayile ezingenisiweyo ezinegama lefayile elifanayo nelefayile esele zikhona?
We will restore the backup into this cou: Siza kubuyisela isuphu kwesi sifundo. Ungabuyela umva ukuze utshintshe iindlela.
This will remove or reset selected resou: Oku kuya kususa okanye kuqalise ngokutsha izixhobo ezikhethiweyo. Esi sixhobo asinakubuyiselwa.
Only letters, digits and underscore (_): Igama ledatha livumela oonobumba, amanani kunye neunderscore (_) kuphela. Oonobumba abangavumelekanga baya kususwa ngokuzenzekelayo.
What general terms and conditions are gi: Zeziphi iimeko jikelele ezinikwa abasebenzisi ukuze basebenzise eli qonga?
Repeat end date must be after start date: Umhla wokuphindaphinda ekugqibeleni kufuneka ube emva komhla wokuqala.
Failed to load attendance. Please try ag: Asiphumelelanga ukulayisha ukubhala ezitratweni. Nceda uzame kwakhona kamva.
Delete this post? This action cannot be: Cima le post? Esi sixeko asinakubuyiselwa.
You need to be a admin or teacher to man: Kufuneka ube ngumlawuli okanye utitshala ukuze ulawule iiprojekthi.
Delete this project? This action cannot: Cima le projekthi? Esi sixeko asinakubuyiselwa.

Type the course code to confirm. All dat: Chwetheza ikhowudi yekhosi ukuqinisekisa. Yonke idatha iya kususwa ngokusisigxina.
Also delete documents that are only used: Cima namaxwebhu asetyenziswa kuphela kule khosi (ukuba akhona).
Selected items will be the only ones inc: Izinto ezikhethiweyo ziya kuba ezodwa ezifakwe kwifayile ephuma.
Moodle requires an internal user id stor: IMoodle ifuna ID yomsebenzisi yangaphakathi egciniweyo kwiXML. Ukuba uyathandabuza, sebenzisa 1.
Username to appear as owner of imported: Igama lomsebenzisi eliya kuvela njengomnini wezinto ezingenisiweyo
A .mbz file will be generated. You will: Ifayile .mbz iya kuveliswa. Uya kukwazi ukuyikhuphela xa igqityiwe.
Your Moodle backup has been created. You: Igcinammo lakho leMoodle lenziwe. Ungalifumana kuluhlu lwezigcinammo zekhosi.
Create your first learning path to start: Yenza indlela yakho yokuqala yokufunda ukuze uqale ukuhlelwa kwesiqulatho sesifundo.
Change title to selected filename: Tshintsha isihloko sibe yigama lefayile elikhethiweyo
You can replace the file, move it to ano: Ungayitshintsha ifayile, uyihambise kwenye ifolda, okanye zombini.
Only non-root folders are shown to avoid: Zibonakaliswa kuphela iifolda ezingeyo ing根 ezona ukugcina izinto kwing根.

Vula icandelo ukuze uhlele umxholo waso.
Vula eli candelo ukuze ulayishe umhleli.
Where do we record the data? (in which s: Siyirekhodwa phi idatha? (kwiseko eliphi, ixhosting aphi, ifikeleleka yinkampani eyiphi eqhuba iiseva, njl.)
How is the data structured? To what exte: Idatha ihlelwe njani? Kwinqanaba elothile umqubao wedatha uyikhusela phi ukhuseleko lwakho? ... Unenye inkqubo esele eyiqinisekileyo yokuba i-hacker ayinakho ukuqokelela yonke idatha yobuqu kwinzamo yokuqala? Ziyigciniweyo?
How is the data structured in this softw: Idatha ihlelwe njani kuso esi sofwea? (itab enye kuzo zonke idatha, inezinye izikali / ilebheli, ...)
How long do we save the data? Is there d: Siyigcina ixesha elingakanani idatha? Ngaba kukho idatha ephela nangona i-akhawunti isasebenza? Sinigcina ixesha elingakanani idatha emva kokusetyenziswa kokugqibelo kwenkqubo?
What changes can we make to the data? Wh: Yintoni na esinokuyenza kutshintshwe kwedatha? Yintoni na esinokwenziwa kutshintshwe kwedatha ngaphandle kokuchaphazela inkonzo?
What do we extract data for (towards oth: Sikhupha yonke into yedatha (ukuya kwezinye iinkqubo zangaphakathi) kwaye yintoni na idatha?
Who can consult the personal data? For w: Ngubani onokujonga idatha yobuqu? Ngenjongo yeyiphi?
How and for what can we use the personal: Singayisebenzisa njani kwaye ngenjongo yeyiphi idatha yobuqu?
With whom can we share them? In what opp: Singabelana nabani? Kwiseko eziphi? Ngokwenziwa kwezinye izinqubo (ezikhuselekileyo okanye kunjalo)?
Do we have another system with which Cha: Ngaba sinenkqubo enye apho i-Chamilo idlalana nayo? Yintoni inkqubo yokudibanisa? Zeziphi na iziqwenga zedatha ezitshintshiwanayo nangawuphi um法?
What are the limits that we will always: Zeziphi imida esiya kuyihlonipha njalo xa sisebenzisa idatha yobuqu? Singafikelela phi?
After how long do we erase the data? (ev: Emva kwexesha elingakanani siyicima idatha? (umsitho, ukusetyenziswa kokugqibelo, ukusebenza kwenkonttrakthi, njl.) Zeziphi iinkqubo zokucima?
What happens if the data is destroyed as: Kwenzekani ukuba idatha itshubhelwe ngenxa yokungaphumeleli kobuchwephesa? (ukucima ngokungekho gunya okanye ukuphulukana nezinto ezibonakalayo, umzekelo)
For what purpose do we process personal: Ngenjongo yeyiphi sisebenza ngayo idatha yobuqu? Siyayisebenzisela ukuhlunga ukufikelela kwabasebenzisi kwiindawo ezithile zesicelo sethu? (ucalucalulo olubi okanye olulungileyo)
Danger zone: deleting an access URL is p: Indawo enobungozi: ukucima i-URL yokufikelela kungapheli.
Type the full URL to confirm. The URL an: Chweta i-URL epheleleyo ukuqinisekisa. I-URL kunye nobudlelwane bayo baya kususwa ngokusisigxina.
